Package Class

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Class.Reservation
public final class Reservation extends Object
Represents a reservation that is created to reserve for a room.
Author:
Chia Jer Wen

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String reservationCode, Guest guestDetails, Room room, LocalDate dateIn, LocalDate dateOut, int numAdults, int numChildren, ResStatus status)
      Creates a new Reservation with the given attributes:
      Reservation Code, guestDetails, room , Check-in date, Check-out date, Number of adults, Number of children, and Reservation Status

      Bill is auto-calculated according to the room price and the check-in and check-out date.

      Parameters:
      reservationCode - This Reservation's Reservation Code
      guestDetails - This Reservation's Guest Details
      room - This Reservation's Room Details
      dateIn - This Reservation's Check-in date
      dateOut - This Reservation's Check-out date
      numAdults - This Reservation's Number of Adults
      numChildren - This Reservation's Number of Children
      status - This Reservation's Reservation Status

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String reservationCode, Guest guestDetails, Room room, LocalDate dateIn, LocalDate dateOut, int numAdults, int numChildren, ResStatus status, double bill)
      Creates a new Reservation with the given attributes:
      Reservation Code, guestDetails, room , Check-in date, Check-out date, Number of adults, Number of children, and Reservation Status
      Parameters:
      reservationCode - This Reservation's Reservation Code
      guestDetails - This Reservation's Guest Details
      room - This Reservation's Room Details
      dateIn - This Reservation's Check-in date
      dateOut - This Reservation's Check-out date
      numAdults - This Reservation's Number of Adults
      numChildren - This Reservation's Number of Children
      status - This Reservation's Reservation Status
      bill - This Reservation's Room Bill

  • Method Details

    • getReservationCode

      public String getReservationCode()
      Gets the Reservation Code associated with this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's Reservation Code.

    • getGuestDetails

      public Guest getGuestDetails()
      Gets the guestDetails of the Guest who made this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's Guest Details.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      Gets the Room Details of the Room reserved in this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's Room Details.

    • getDateIn

      public LocalDate getDateIn()
      Gets the check-in date which is declared in this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's check-in Date

      public LocalDate getDateOut()
      Gets the check-out date which is declared in this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's check-out date

      Gets the number of adults which is declared in this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's number of adults

      public int getNumChildren()
      Gets the number of children which is declared in this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's number of children

    • getStatus

      public ResStatus getStatus()
      Gets the Reservation Status of this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's reservation status

    • getNumDaysBetween

      public long getNumDaysBetween()
      Gets the number of days between check-in date which is inclusive and check-out date which is exclusive of this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's number of nights between check-in date and check-out date

    • getBill

      public double getBill()
      Gets the room bill of this Reservation which is generated while creation or update of this Reservation
      Returns:
      this Reservation's room bill

    • setReservationCode

      public void setReservationCode(String reservationCode)
      Changes the Reservation Code of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      reservationCode - the new reservationCode of this Reservation

    • setGuestDetails

      public void setGuestDetails(Guest guestDetails)
      Changes the guestDetails of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      guestDetails - the new guestDetails of this Reservation

    • setRoom

      public void setRoom(Room room)
      Changes the room of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      room - the new room of this Reservation

    • setDateIn

      public void setDateIn(LocalDate dateIn)
      Changes the check-in date of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      dateIn - the new check-in date of this Reservation, must be before dateOut

    • setDateOut

      public void setDateOut(LocalDate dateOut)
      Changes the check-out date of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      dateOut - the new check-out date of this Reservation, must be after dateIn

    • setNumAdults

      public void setNumAdults(int numAdults)
      Changes the number of adults of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      numAdults - the new number of adults of this Reservation, must not be a negative integer

    • setNumChildren

      public void setNumChildren(int numChildren)
      Changes the number of children of this Reservation
      Parameters:
      numChildren - the new number of adults of this Reservation, must not be a negative integer

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(ResStatus status)
      Changes the Reservation Status of this Reservation.
      Parameters:
      status - Status of reservation.

    • setNumDaysBetween

      public void setNumDaysBetween(long numDaysBetween)
      Changes the number of days between the check-in date which is inclusive, and check-out date which is exclusive.
      Parameters:
      numDaysBetween - the new number of days between check-in date and check-out date

    • setBill

      public void setBill(double bill)
      Changes the amount of bill in this Reservation
      Parameters:
      bill - the new amount of bill of this Reservation

    • isExpired

      public boolean isExpired()
      Test whether this Reservation is expired or not
      Returns:
      true if this Reservation has EXPIRED, or else return false

    • isConfirmed

      public boolean isConfirmed()
      Test whether this Reservation is confirmed or not
      Returns:
      true if this Reservation is CONFIRMED, or else return false

    • isWaitlist

      public boolean isWaitlist()
      Test whether this Reservation is in waitlist or not
      Returns:
      true if this Reservation is in WAITLIST, or else return false

    • isCheckedIn

      public boolean isCheckedIn()
      Test whether this Reservation is checked-in or not
      Returns:
      true if this Reservation is in CHECKED_IN, or else return false

    • autoRoomBill

      public void autoRoomBill()
      call the function calRoomBill() to calculate the room bill of this Reservation
      then update the new room bill to this Reservation.
